letterPattern.description: Find words whose letters match a regular expression.

letters.description: Find words with a specific number of letters.

lettersMin.description: Find words with at least the specified number of letters.

lettersMax.description: Find words with at most the specified number of letters.

pronunciationPattern.description: Find words with at most the specified number of letters.

sounds.description: Find words with a specific number of sounds.

soundsMin.description: Find words with at least the specified number of sounds.

soundsMax.description: Find words with at most the specified number of phonemes.

partOfSpeech.description: Find words with at least one definition whose part of speech matches the specified value.

hasDetails.description: Find words that have at least one instance of the detail type.

limit.description: The most number of results to return in one request.

random.description: Find a random word matching your search criteria.

name: ask_to_user
description: You can ask user for guidance when you think you need more information to handle the task, but you should use this tool as less as you can.

question.description: The question you want to ask to user.

name: finish
description: Finish the task and give your answer.
